qas.question: What are the three HDTV parameters?
Which two parameters can be dropped if its value is implied from context?
When can the frame size or frame rate parameter specification be dropped?

answers.text: if its value is implied from context

qas.question: When a parameter is dropped, the remaining numeric parameter is specified first, followed by what?

plausible_answers.text: [frame size][scanning system][frame or field rate] or [frame size]

qas.question: What are the three SDTV parameters?
Which two parameters can't be dropped if its value is implied from context?
When can the frame size or frame rate parameter specification be not dropped?
When a parameter is dropped, the remaining numeric parameter is specified last, followed by what?

context: If all three parameters are used, they are specified in the following form: <a0_0><b4_0>[frame size][scanning system][frame or field rate]<a0_0/> or [frame size]<b4_0/>/[frame or field rate][scanning system].[citation needed] Often, <a1_0><b5_0>frame size or frame rate<b5_0/><a1_0/> can be dropped <a2_0>if its <b6_0>value is implied from context<b6_0/><a2_0/>. In this case, the remaining numeric parameter is specified first, followed by <a3_0>the <b7_0>scanning system<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
